title: If any non-residential unit holder demands residential unit against his non-residential previous holding, such request may be considered by Commissioner in consultation with HPC
clause_text: If any non-residential unit holder demands residential unit against his non-residential previous holding, such request may be considered by Commissioner in consultation with HPC. However to consider such request shall not be obligatory on the part of the Commissioner.
section: Terms of Allotment of Rehabilitation Tenements â€“
